== Kubuntu Tutorials Day ==

We are working hard on Kubuntu Maverick.  Join us in these tutorials to learn how to help out with Kubuntu and KDE generally.

When is it?  Wednesday July 7th from 18:00UTC

Where is it?  On freenode IRC chat network in the #kubuntu-devel channel

Logs for the entire day at: http://goo.gl/Z5FG
